item.title: Contestant Consistency
item.description: Your Task The Data No Sh*t Sherlock Volatility Volcano A Different perspective Your Task Validate (or invalidate) the hypothesis that a Taskmaster champion, is one that is a consistent Taskmaster contestant. Some Background In many episodes of the Taskmaster Podcast (example episodes and timestamps) , it is hypothesised that a key to becoming a Taskmaster Champion is that the contestants are consistent in the task points that they receive, compared to those who are more inconsistent and volatile in their points.
